price: Basi sifa njema zote ni za Mwenyezi Mungu, Mola Mlezi wa mbingu, na Mola Mlezi wa ardhi, na Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Basi ni za Mwenyezi Mungu pekee sifa njema, Muumba mbingu na ardhi, na Muumba wa viumbe vyote. Kwani hivi kuwa ni Mola Mlezi wa kila kitu unawajibika uhimidiwe kwa neema zote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falillahi al-ḥamdu rabbi al-samāwāti warabbi al-arḍi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
